resources.string: This screens shows My Music,Albums,Genre, and My playlist. A user can open all these activities in order to get detailed view of them and can use media controls to rewind, play/pause, and forward the music respectively. This application uses mediaPlayer class to control the playback of audio.
This screen shows favourite music of the user. The user can press cross in order to return to main menu, can press plus sign in order to add a song to the playlist and can also download a song.
On this screen the user can see all the albums with thumbnail and can press on each album to open it.
On this screen the user can see Musical Genres. The user can press each of the genre in order to see a list of songs of that genre.
On this screen the user can see all the playlist created by the user. The user can press on each of the playlist in order to see the list of songs.
